column4: does the ubuntu installer automatically do the XFree server config, and does it use binary nvidia drivers if you have an nvidia card?
or do i have to hack it up like i do on my distros :)
during the initail run, I know for sure there is an ati choise, but just browsing by I didn't see a nvidia one
alas, I do not use nvidia, so I wasn't looking, I just didn't notice
